description: set and retrieve configuration of WireGuard interfaces
name: wg

subcommands.name: addconf
subcommands.description: Appends the contents of <configuration-filename> to the current configuration of <interface>.

subcommands.name: genkey
subcommands.description: Generates a random private key in base64 and prints it to standard output.

subcommands.name: genpsk
subcommands.description: Generates a random preshared key in base64 and prints it to standard output.

subcommands.name: pubkey
subcommands.description: Calculates a public key and prints it in base64 to standard output from a corresponding private key.

subcommands.name: set
subcommands.description: Sets configuration values for the specified <interface>.

subcommands.name: setconf
subcommands.description: Sets the current configuration of <interface> to the contents of <configuration-filename>.

subcommands.name: show
subcommands.description: Shows current WireGuard configuration and runtime information of specified <interface>.
subcommands.usage: show { <interface> | all | interfaces } [public-key | private-key | listen-port | fwmark | peers | preshared-keys | endpoints | allowed-ips | latest-handshakes | persistent-keepalive | transfer | dump]

subcommands.name: showconf
subcommands.description: Shows the current configuration of <interface> in the format described by CONFIGURATION FILE FORMAT.

subcommands.name: syncconf
subcommands.description: Like setconf, but reads back the existing configuration first and only makes changes that are explicitly different between the configuration file and the interface.

options.description: A comma-separated list of IP (v4 or v6) addresses with CIDR masks from which incoming traffic for this peer is allowed and to which outgoing traffic for this peer is directed.
An endpoint IP or hostname, followed by a colon, and then a port number.
A seconds interval, between 1 and 65535 inclusive, of how often to send an authenticated empty packet to the peer for the purpose of keeping a stateful firewall or NAT mapping valid persistently.
A base64 private key generated by wg genkey.
A base64 preshared key generated by wg genpsk.
A base64 public key calculated by wg pubkey from a private key.
